named-query.name: UserInfo.selectUserIsConnected
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserInfo u WHERE u.isConnected = 1

named-query.name: Player.getPlayersByGender
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Player p WHERE p.gender = ?1

named-query.name: Game.getMaxGameId
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(g.id) as maxIdGame FROM Game g

named-query.name: Game.getGamesByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM Game g WHERE g.userInfo.id = ?1

named-query.name: UserInfo.selectUserInfoByUsername
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserInfo u WHERE u.user = ?1
